title: NDHeckfire's very generic authorpage
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :topia:listusers-1 users="."]]
Hello, %%title%%! Have we met before?
[[include :topia:listusers-2]]
Hello, esteemed authors and readers alike!
[[include :topia:listusers-3]]

If it wasn't obvious, I am [[*user ndheckfire]] and I am a writer for the SCP Wiki!

I've been a fan of SCP Foundationverse for a long time now, and it's so happy to finally be a part of its wonderful community! I'm a regular on the IRC (especially in #thecritters), so you'll probably see me around.

Welcome to my official authorpage![[footnote]]I have this now! Yay![[/footnote]] I made this just so I can keep tabs on the stuff I created simultaneously, and without me having to check every single one individually. I'm not trying to do anything fancy here but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless!

@@ @@

[[tabview]]
[[tab SCPs]]

**[[[scp-6219|Abnormality-6219]]]**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6219"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Any subject mentioning **Abnormality-6219**, whether through speech or writing, will refer to **Abnormality-6219** as "Abnormality-6219".
----
**[[[SCP-6708]]] -- Breaking Hellfire**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6708"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Surrounding it are multiple large metal cages, with all of them containing traces of hydrochloric acid and dried blood.
----
**[[[SCP-6232]]] -- When Lilacs Last in the Dooryard Bloomed (w/ [[*user Kilerpoyo]])**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6232"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6232 is the designation given to a humanoid entity possessing a physical appearance identical to the late Abraham Lincoln.
----
**[[[SCP-6421]]] -- The President of the Republic of Chile is Spiderman**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6421"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> These affected billboards and posters usually depict a photo or an artwork of the fictional Marvel Comics character, Spiderman, as being the current President of the Republic of Chile.
----
**[[[SCP-6641]]] -- Who Needs Wake-Up Calls When You Got //ARM//**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6641"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6641-1 will manifest on the back of Dr. Orville and will use any means necessary to wake him from his sleep.
----
**[[[SCP-6571]]] -- RIGHTFULLY STOLEN**[[footnote]]Entry for DEPARTMENT-CON 2022.[[/footnote]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-6571"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6571 is the designation given to a large paratechnological/thaumaturgical ontokinetic eigenweapon device that was initially built by the US military during the Second World War.
----
**[[[SCP-6349]]] -- Up Close and Personal with... Venus!**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6349"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Foundation orbital scanners reported that Venus has somehow detached itself from its natural solar orbit and was currently heading towards Earth.
----
**[[[SCP-6153]]] -- Fortune (w/ [[*user guiness11]], [[*user NotOrteil]] and [[*user Jhigard Foreigner]])**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6153"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6153 is a widespread probabilistic anomaly, affecting either beneficial or harmful events occurring to an individual, colloquially known as "luck".
----
**[[[SCP-6739]]] -- An Absence of... Something?**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6739"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Any individual perceiving and comprehending this corner wall will become entirely convinced that //something// was once previously located in that specific spot.
----
**[[[SCP-6961]]] -- Hate the Message, Not the Messenger**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6961"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6961 is an anomalous event where a large-winged humanoid entity suddenly manifested 200 meters atop Vatican City.
----
**[[[SCP-12954-J]]] -- Damn, That's Deep**
[[module ListPages name="scp-12954-j"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-12954-J is a circular pot lid possessing a black lifter handle. SCP-12954-J was once Dr. Benjamin Hefter of the Department of Other. Attempts to bring back Dr. Hefter are still ongoing.
----
**[[[SCP-6645]]] -- All I See is Flames**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6645"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6645 is Foundation Junior Researcher David Kobolsky. SCP-6645 received its SCP designation following an anomalous event that occurred on the 9th of September, 2018.
----
**[[[SCP-6296]]] -- The Last Slice to Make it Count**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6296"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6296 is a single triangular pizza slice that has been permanently situated in the Habitation and Sustenance Section cafeteria, at Site-43. As part of the Initiative, SCP-6296 was chosen among the anomalies housed in Site-43 that require neutralization.
----
**[[[SCP-7297]]] -- It Wasn't Curiosity This Time**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7297"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7297 is a female domestic cat. Any individual directly perceiving and/or having skin contact with SCP-7297 will be overcome with an extreme sense of calmness and contentment.
----
**[[[SCP-7742]]] -- Till Death Do Us Part, But I Think I've Already Past That Phase**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7742"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7742 is the designation given to former Foundation Field Agent Blonsky Batherson, previously an active operative of Mobile Task Force Eta-77. To summarize, SCP-7742 possesses the capability of functional immortality.
----
**[[[SCP-7520]]] -- Karma's a --bitch-- spiteful and unpleasant individual**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7520"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Dr. Curran is to wear a specialized safety helmet at all times, including during sleep and personal washroom hours. Manifested garden hoes are to be collected and transported to Acroamatic Abatement Facility AAF-Y/400 for proper thermal treatment.
----
**[[[SCP-6673]]] -- The One Lonely Eleventh**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6673"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6673 is an anomaly that manifests itself on April 11th every year, particularly affecting Dr. Maximillian Kaydence. On this day, all other individuals seem to ignore, be disinterested in, or otherwise take no notice of any type of noticeable action made by Dr. Kaydence.
----
**[[[SCP-7417]]] -- Sole Foresight**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7417"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7417 possesses a unique form of functional precognition where, upon visually perceiving any object (including living entities), she is capable of viewing their physical appearance as how they are approximately one year later.
----
**[[[SCP-5829]]] -- Finding... Yourself**
[[module ListPages name="scp-5829"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-5829 captures the video of two distinct possibly anomalous entities conversing amongst each other in perfect English for several seconds. Due to the position of the video recorder, it could only capture the bottom half of the entities.
----
**[[[SCP-7170]]] -- Within Hindsight**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7170"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Whenever SCP-7170 expires through any known means, her current consciousness will temporally travel backward in time, approximately 30 seconds prior to the actual time of her demise.
----
**[[[SCP-7617]]] -- Let Me Be a Part of the Narrative, In the Story They Will Write Someday**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7617"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7617 seems to only possess a DMRG reading of -3 at the time of writing, which is extremely unusual and completely unlikely for personnel employed by the Foundation.
----
**[[[SCP-7917]]] -- The Worst Distance Between Two People**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7917"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7917 was discovered on the 28th of August, 2019, after Dr. Dannielle Johallender filed a HR Complaint relating to "extremely unprofessional conduct" on the part of SCP-7917-A.
----
**[[[SCP-6562]]] -- The Same Kind of Grayness as the Filthy Stuff that Formed You**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6562"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6562 possesses a common form of one-sided telepathy. When in the proximity of one or more human individual(s), SCP-6562 is capable of inwardly "hearing" their inner thoughts and conception.
----
**[[[SCP-7397]]] -- When Life Gives You Lemons, Don't Show It to Technician Graves or Else Shit Will Hit the Fan One Way or Another**[[footnote]]Entry for ColdpostCon 2023.[[/footnote]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-7397"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7397 personifies whenever Technician Graves is presented with the chance of consuming the lemonade created by SCP-7397-A's manipulation of probability.
----
**[[[SCP-6450]]] -- The Nam'Evanholly Hidebehind**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6450"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6450 is known throughout the local civilian community as "the Nam'Evanholly Hidebehind". The existence of SCP-6450 is still unconfirmed. 
----
**[[[SCP-7571]]] -- A Joy That is Shared is a Joy Made Double**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7571"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7571 spontaneously manifested as the capability of both SCP-7571-A and SCP-7571-B to directly communicate and interface their own thoughts with each other via a psychological telepathic link.
----
**[[[SCP-7872]]] -- Non Cogito, Ergo Non Sum**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7872"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7872 is Senior Researcher Kristoffer Rosheen, who does not exist. Further information regarding SCP-7872 is unavailable, for obvious reasons (that being his nonexistence).
----
**[[[SCP-6955]]] -- The World That Was Smiling When I Turned (w/ [[*user BluestBunny]])**
[[module ListPages name="scp-6955"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-6955 is capable of becoming aware of any particular object, entity or event that would put Dr. Lantieern's life at risk, far before said object, entity or event could even be posed as a direct threat to Dr. Lantieern.
----
**[[[SCP-7434]]] -- Connoisseur of Comfort**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7434"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> It appears that whenever they are in the presence of Ms. Lauraine, these personnel express feelings of increased affection and endearment towards the individual in question.
----
**[[[SCP-7176]]] -- The Doctor in the White Room, Falling Harder**
[[module ListPages name="scp-7176"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> SCP-7176-A refers to Senior Researcher Zastryal Vnutri. Following the successful enactment of Project ÁSPRO, SCP-7176-A is now permanently located in SCP-7176 and is a central component of the anomaly.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Tales]]

**[[[A Night in the Woods]]] (w/ [[*user Kilerpoyo]])**
[[module ListPages name="a-night-in-the-woods"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> Then it happened, a motherfucking portal or some sort of thing appeared in the middle of my camp. It was like a ripple in time and space itself.
----
**[[[A Curious Case of Botanophobia]]] (w/ [[*user Kilerpoyo]])**
[[module ListPages name="a-curious-case-of-botanophobia"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> I have been attacked by that god-forsaken tree!!! I was awoken from deepest sleep to find its wicket roots constricting me. I manage to break free from that treacherous plant.

[[/tab]]
[[tab GOI Formats]]

**[[[UIU File 2019-132]]] (w/ [[*user Kilerpoyo]])**
[[module ListPages name="uiu-file-2019-132"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]** (##grey|%%comments%% comments##)
[[/module]]
> On January 3rd, 2019 an anomalously large member of the Milnesium tardigradum species suddenly manifested in the cafeteria of the Atlanta Headquarters.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Serious Stuff]]

@@ @@

= In the event that I, NDHeckfire, have become inactive[[footnote]]Meaning I haven't made a single post or edit.[[/footnote]] on the SCP Wiki for more than one (1) year, I shall leave all of my solo articles to the hands of my good friend, [[*user Kilerpoyo]] and they have permission from me to do whatever they want with them (except delete them, unless they've dipped into the deletions threshold).

= Any collaborative articles will, of course, be given to their respective co-authors.

@@ @@

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

@@ @@

[[footnoteblock]]

author: NDHeckfire
